channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hegseth reaffirms Vietnam partnership and hands over a leather box, belt and knife—wartime artifacts taken by U.S. soldiers
item.description: “Today we will exchange artifacts and information from the war with the goal of helping family members in both countries find peace.”

item.title: Trump says immigration raid efforts ‘haven’t gone far enough’
item.description: Trump said the tactics used by immigration agents were acceptable “because you have to get the people out.”

item.title: Stock futures climb as investors await Supreme Court showdown on Trump tariffs and shareholder vote on Musk’s $1 trillion pay package
item.description: On Thursday, Tesla shareholders will gather for the company's annual meeting and will vote on Musk's $1 trillion compensation package.

item.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in November on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max and more

item.title: The discovery that linked signature size to narcissism

item.title: Stop choosing between being a friend or a leader. The best executives do both

item.title: Transportation secretary says he doesn’t plan to fire air traffic controllers who don’t show up for work during shutdown
item.description: Before the shutdown, the FAA was already dealing with a long-standing shortage of about 3,000 air traffic controllers.

item.title: Berkshire Cash Sets Record as Profit Rises, Signaling Caution Ahead of Buffett Exit
item.description: Vice Chairman Greg Abel will succeed the legendary investor, though Buffett will remain chairman.

item.title: This One Brilliant Investment Would Have Made Bezos a Billionaire Without Amazon

item.title: Fearing for her children’s safety, Mississippi woman shoots and kills escaped research monkey
item.description: “I shot at it and it just stood there, and I shot again, and he backed up and that's when he fell.”

item.title: Pfizer Sues to Stop Rival Bid for Drugmaker Metsera by Denmark’s Novo Nordisk
item.description: Metsera currently has no products on the market, but is developing oral and injectable treatments for obesity and diabetes.

item.title: How Tiny Drones Inspired by Bats Could Save Lives in Dark and Stormy Conditions
item.description: Students at Worcester Polytechnic Institute are designing small drones that use ultrasonic sensors.

item.title: The ‘Cheating App’ Founder Explains How to Rage Bait Your Startup to Success
item.description: Cluey reached a more than $100M valuation after an investment by Andreessen Horowitz.
